text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Auto Scaling API errors>
We are investigating increased error rates for all API calls in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Auto Scaling API errors>
Between 8:43 AM and 9:26 AM PDT we experienced increased error rates for API calls in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
